dist.hmm

Class ConditionalStateDistributionWrapper

  • java.lang.Object
    • dist.hmm.ConditionalStateDistributionWrapper
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    StateDistribution

    public class ConditionalStateDistributionWrapper
extends java.lang.Object
implements StateDistribution
    A wrapper class that turns a regular conditional distribution into a conditional state distribution (at some computational cost)
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Andrew Guillory gtg008g@mail.gatech.edu

      • estimate

        public void estimate(double[][] expectations,
            DataSet sequence)
        Description copied from interface: StateDistribution
        Match the given expectations and observations
        Specified by:
        estimate in interface StateDistribution
        Parameters:
        expectations - entry [k][j] is the probability of transitioning from this state to state j correpsonding to observation k, k can be seen as kind of like t all though it is not in practice since observations is many sequences glued together
        sequence - the sequence of corresponding observations
